lead_paragraph: The San Diego County medical examiner’s office said an instructor twice pushed Seaman James D. Lovelace under water after he had shown signs of distress.

headline.print_headline: Death of Navy SEAL Trainee During Drill Is Ruled Homicide
headline.main: Navy Seaman’s Drowning in SEAL Training Exercise Is Ruled a Homicide

snippet: The San Diego County medical examiner’s office said an instructor twice pushed Seaman James D. Lovelace under water after he had shown signs of distress....
abstract: San Diego County medical examiner rules May drowning death of Navy SEAL trainee James D Lovelace during training exercise was homicide; video showed instructor twice pushing struggling trainee underwater, action that violates Navy rules.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
